Missouri

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: Duration of one-year presumed reasonable
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice r
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include specific duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited, such as: "The employee agrees not to engage in any competing business within the state of Missouri for a period of 12 months following termination of employment." Ensure the scope is reasonable and tailored to the company's legitimate business interests under Missouri law.

laws.suggestion: Remove salary history questions. Replace with: 'Please provide your salary expectations for this role, as Missouri law prohibits requesting or requiring disclosure of prior salaries.
